text: Antonio María Vicente Narciso Borrero y Cortázar (29 October 1827 – 9 October 1911) was Vice President of Ecuador from 1863 to 1864 and President from 9 December 1875 to 18 December 1876. Borrero was born in Cuenca, Ecuador on 29 October 1827. He died on 9 October 1911 in Quito, Ecuador from natural causes, aged 83. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1827 births Category:1911 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador
title: Antonio Borrero
